title: Solar-powered water pump
summary: Solar-powered water pump, capable of pumping at least 3,500L per day to a height of 30m at 30PSI or greater.

eligible.eligibleBullet01: be a solar powered water pump
eligible.eligibleBullet02: be a self-contained system in a lockable steel box
eligible.eligibleBullet03: have a self-priming water pump capable of pumping at least 3,500L per day to a height of 30m at 30PSI or greater - items that can pump over 10mÂ³ per day are not eligible
eligible.eligibleBullet04: have a solar panel, inverter and battery
eligible.eligibleBullet05: include 5m of inlet pipe with filter
eligible.eligibleBullet06: have automatic shut off for the pump when water flow is not required
